Sentencas: The commercialization of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) systems is restricted by the low reliability and durability severely.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis of SOFC system based on single cell voltage analysis

Sentencas: Generally, a SOFC system includes stack, combustion chamber, fuel heat exchanger, air heat exchanger, steam generator, reformer, and blower, etc.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis of SOFC system based on single cell voltage analysis

Sentencas: Faults of any part of the SOFC system will affect the performance of the entire system at any time, causing a decrease in the durability and reliability.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis of SOFC system based on single cell voltage analysis

Sentencas: Therefore, more and more attention has focused on the fault diagnosis technology on the SOFC system lifetime research.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis of SOFC system based on single cell voltage analysis

Sentencas: However, the practicability of current fault diagnosis algorithm is not enough on account of the redundant fault signals.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis of SOFC system based on single cell voltage analysis

Sentencas: This paper proposed an improved algorithm for the fault diagnosis using the single cell voltage as the only fault characteristic signal.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis of SOFC system based on single cell voltage analysis

Sentencas: The voltage signal in time domain with four representative system faults (stack degradation failure, reformer degradation failure, fuel leakage failure, and air leakage failure) are generated by simulation.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis of SOFC system based on single cell voltage analysis

Sentencas: The fault voltage signal in frequency domain is obtained by Fourier transform of voltage signal in time domain.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis of SOFC system based on single cell voltage analysis

Sentencas: Then the characteristics of the fault voltage signal in time domain and in frequency domain are extracted, and the voltage performance of fault signal in time domain are analyzed.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis of SOFC system based on single cell voltage analysis

Sentencas: The single fault and simultaneous fault were diagnosed for four representative system faults and their combination using a suitable classifier.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis of SOFC system based on single cell voltage analysis

Sentencas: Both types of the fault diagnoses have achieved good recognition effects, which fully verified the feasibility of this improved algorithm.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis of SOFC system based on single cell voltage analysis
